name: War Mission: Shooting Tank
description:
War Mission: Shooting Tank is an Shooting Tank game with a stunning graphics, realistic physics and a huge amount of vehicles.
Most famous tanks fighting for the glory and honor of their countries!
Tank battles are fast and spectacular, there is no time for thinking.
Choose your best tank and dive into the world of exciting tanks battles.

Features:
- Tank battle simulator in 3D;
- Nostalgic old school tank game;
- Smooth controlling and animation;
- Realistic cool shooting sounds.
